original_text: I found he had done nothing deserving of death, but because he made his appeal to the Emperor I decided to send him to Rome.
korean_text: 내가 살피건대 죽일 죄를 범한 일이 없더이다 그러나 그가 황제에게 상소한 고로 보내기로 결정하였나이다

sentences.original_text: I found he had done nothing
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그가 아무것도 하지 않았다는 것을 발견했습니다

sentences.original_text: but because he made his appeal to the Emperor
I decided to send him to Rome
